sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(FinTech_PaymentGateway) participant S as Switch
(FinTech_AuthVault) participant B as Computadora B
(FinTech_LedgerService) participant C as Computadora C
(FinTech_TransactionQueue) participant D as Computadora D
(FinTech_PaymentGateway) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (FinTech_TransactionQueue) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (FinTech_FraudDetection)
Destino: Broadcast (FinTech_AuthVault) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (FinTech_AuthVault) S->>C: ARP Request (FinTech_AuthVault) S->>D: ARP Request (FinTech_FraudDetection) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
Destino: A (FinTech_FraudDetection) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (FinTech_PaymentGateway) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (FinTech_AuthVault)
Destino: C (FinTech_TransactionQueue) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (FinTech_FraudDetection)
